overview: A short movie about a 25-year-old girl who explores the underlying thrusts, senses, and insinuations of her psyche during the COVID lockdown period. She finds comfort in the presence of her friend. They find bliss in their deep conversations and verbal expeditions. But gradually she is ascertained with a life-changing perception about herself. And she canâ€™t process this apprehension.
title: Inside
